backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report placeholder with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including components, pages, styles, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with BrandProvider and CartProvider.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Cart context managing items, persistence, and total calculations.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with route links and cart badge.
frontend/src/components/BrandProvider.ts: Context for editable brand name and logo with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with editable brand name/logo and responsive navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card with image, price, optional quantity controls, and add-to-cart logic.
Horizontal product carousel with scroll buttons and ProductCard items.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports arrays of thepla and other product items along with category labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using react-query, updating it when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context and provider with login, logout, and identity restoration logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and utility styles including dark mode and scrollbar hiding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app and wraps it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the account page with user info, links to contact and FAQ, and placeholders for future features.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls and summary, or an empty-cart prompt linking to product categories.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows categorized thepla products and other products using a carousel, with a scrolling quantity note.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with phone, location, email, and Instagram fields, using local state for email and Instagram inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays an accordion-style FAQ section backed by a static list and toggleable open state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero banner, story content, and a Buy Now action that adds a default product to the cart and navigates to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a list of predefined notifications with icons, titles, messages, and timestamps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, and animations, with plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, architecture, known issues, and generated images for an ICP-based thepla e-commerce site.
